absoluteMagnitude.description: The absolute magnitude of the asteroid

estDiameterKmMin.description: The minimum needed diameter in kilometers needed for an asteroid to have this classification

estDiameterKmMax.description: The maximum diamter in kilometers an asteroid can be to have this classification

estDiametermMin.description: The minimum needed diameter in meters needed for an asteroid to have this classification

estDiametermMax.description: The maximum diamter in meters an asteroid can be to have this classification

estDiameterMilesMin.description: The minimum needed diameter in miles needed for an asteroid to have this classification

estDiameterMilesMax.description: The maximum diamter in miles an asteroid can be to have this classification

estDiameterFeetMin.description: The minimum needed diameter in feet needed for an asteroid to have this classification

estDiameterFeetMax.description: The maximum diamter in feet an asteroid can be to have this classification
